meanings.definition: The condition or state of being an epiphyte.
meanings.sent1: Epiphytisms can be seen in plants growing on other plants.
meanings.sent2: The forest was full of epiphytisms, with ferns and mosses clinging to tree branches.
meanings.sent3: The epiphytisms in the garden seemed to be having a party on the tree.
meanings.sent4: In the dense jungle, epiphytisms created a lush green tapestry on the tall trees.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of epiphytisms in the rainforest was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The growth habit of an epiphyte.
meanings.sent1: Epiphytisms often thrive in humid environments.
meanings.sent2: The epiphytisms in the greenhouse displayed various shades of green.
meanings.sent3: The epiphytisms in the wild seemed to be reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent4: The garden resembled a miniature forest with its collection of epiphytisms.
meanings.sent5: The delicate epiphytisms added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: The relationship between an epiphyte and its host plant.
meanings.sent1: Epiphytisms rely on their host plants for support and nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The symbiotic relationship between epiphytisms and trees is fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The epiphytisms and their host plant seemed to be sharing secrets.
meanings.sent4: The harmony between epiphytisms and their hosts was a marvel of nature.
meanings.sent5: The bond between epiphytisms and their host plants was unbreakable.
